name: stash'em up
description:
Stash'em Up is a shmup where the weapons you collect trail behind you.
Building up a big arsenal is both a strength and a weakness as the more you tail of weapon grows, the harder it can can be to move around freely.
Moreover, the weapons you pick-up all have limited ammunition so without careful management, it's possible to end up with many empty weapons scattered around your tail.

___

This is our submission for the gogodotjam of 2021. The theme of the jam was “GROWTH”, and the period was of 10 days.

Please note that every art assets are licensed under the CC-BY license while the code is licensed under MIT.

You can grab the source code at https://codeberg.org/one-winged-craft/gogodotjam-growth

Hope you like it ;-)
